# Habit Tracker Application Instructions

This is a React-based habit tracker application built with Vite. When working on this project, please follow these guidelines:

## Project Structure
- Use React functional components with hooks
- Store habit data in localStorage for persistence
- Follow a component-based architecture
- Use modern CSS with flexbox and grid for layouts

## Key Features
- Add new habits with predefined suggestions
- Mark habits as complete for today
- Track habit streaks and statistics
- Delete habits with confirmation
- Responsive design for mobile and desktop

## Code Style
- Use modern JavaScript (ES6+) features
- Prefer const/let over var
- Use destructuring where appropriate
- Keep components focused and reusable
- Use meaningful variable and function names

## State Management
- Use custom hooks for complex state logic
- Keep state as local as possible
- Use localStorage for data persistence
- Handle loading and error states gracefully

## UI/UX Guidelines
- Maintain a clean, modern design
- Use consistent spacing and colors
- Ensure good contrast and accessibility
- Make interactive elements obvious
- Provide visual feedback for user actions
